The name of the person discharging managerial responsibilities ("PDMR") in respect of whom this notification is made is Helen Lamprell.

On 15 December 2021, AVEVA Group plc (the "Company") granted options to acquire ordinary shares of 3 5 / 9 pence each in the Company in favour of the above-named PDMR under the terms of the AVEVA Group PLC Restricted Share Plan 2021.

The number of shares in respect of which the options were granted is 3,344.
